name: E3MOJI
description:
(Best on Chrome/Firefox, full-screen or on 1080P+. Performance improvements on 2016-08-16)

You awake in a bleak cyberpunk dystopia, in which companies (Corps) have replaced countries. You are a lifer with your Corp, and you must present your Corp's games to an emoji audience of millions at virtual E3.

Your Corp? Giant Bomb.

Using your superhuman abilities of empathy and rhetoric, you know how your audience will respond to what you say. But they have their own personalities, and you can't please everyone all the time. Do the best you can, and don't think about what will happen to you if you lose.

This is my first gamejam and first game, so let me know what you think!
